## ActivityInstance type

Represents the data of an Activity Instance: a current Activity which is part of a Process Instance (V2).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ActivityInstance = ActivityInstanceBase & {
    ActivityConstraints?: Array<ActivityConstraints>;
    ActivityState?: ActivityState;
};
```

**References:** [ActivityInstanceBase](./open-api-client.activityinstancebase.md)<!-- -->, [ActivityConstraints](./open-api-client.activityconstraints.md)<!-- -->, [ActivityState](./open-api-client.activitystate.md)
